title: Hanwha Demonstrates Redback IFV to Polish Army
dc:creator: Stephen W. Miller
description:
Hanwha Defenseâ€™s Redback AS-21 next-generation infantry fighting vehicle is undergoing field evaluation by the Polish Army. The conduct of this demonstration in Poland, which was raised in early September and began in mid-October, was confirmed by both an announcement by Hanwha and a statement by Polish Defence Minister Mariusz Blaszczak.
